thread.title: The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 18, 2015
thread.title_full: The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 18, 2015

author: Dan Worthington
title: The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 18, 2015
text:
By Dan Worthington October 18 at 12:58 AM Follow @danworthington 

The easiest way to deal with moving parts and different stories on each cover throughout multiple editions is to build the page how it will look at the end of the night. From there, you can collapse or expand stories to hold space for those later events. 
The Sunday cover lineup was ALCS, NLCS, Redskins, Wolverines and Caps. With two night events, ALCS held space for both baseball games and Wiz started on the front instead of the Caps game.
